TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit LockCookie extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Defines the lock that implements single-writer/multiple-reader semantics. This is a value type.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to request a reader lock, upgrade the reader lock to a writer lock, and save the LockCookie. It then uses the LockCookie to downgrade to a reader lock again.
This code is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock> class.
[!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.threading.lockc_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.threading.lockc_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.threading.lockc_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.threading.lockc_2.cpp)] [!code-cs[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.threading.lockc_2.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.threading.lockc_2.vb)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.threading.lockc_3.cpp)] [!code-cs[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.threading.lockc_3.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.threading.lockc_3.vb)]
